quoteText:
Use of the Site and Services is limited to Authorized Users (as defined below) who are eighteen (18) years of age or older and/or have legal capacity to form a binding contract or, as set forth below, Authorized Users who are under 18 years of age with consent of a parent or guardian.

If You have not reached the age of majority in Your jurisdiction of residence ("Not of Majority Age"), You may not use the Site except with the supervision and permission of a parent or legal guardian.
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
tosdr.tldr: Turnitin can only be used by people 18 and over and/or can form a legally binding contract, or people under 18 with parental or guardian consent. If you are under the age of majority in your residence you must use Turnitin with the supervision and permission of a parent or legal guardian.
